content: #include<bits/stdc++.h>#define N 2621450 #define pi acos(-1) using namespace std; typedef complex<double> E; int n,m,l,r[N]; E a[N],b[N]; void fft(E *a,int f){  for(int i=0;i<n;i++)if(i<r[i])swap(a[i],a[r[i]]);  for(int i=1;i<n;i<<=1){  E wn(cos(pi/i),f*sin(pi/i));  for(int p=i<<1,j=0;j<n;j+=p){  E w(1,0);  for(int k=0;k<i;k++,w*=wn){  E x=a[j+k],y=w*a[j+k+i];  a[j+k]=x+y;a[j+k+i]=x-y;  }  }  } } inline int read(){  int f=1,x=0;char ch;  do{ch=getchar();if(ch=='-')f=-1;}while(ch<'0'||ch>'9');  do{x=x*10+ch-'0';ch=getchar();}while(ch>='0'&&ch<='9');  return f*x; } int main(){  n=read();m=read();  for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)a[i]=read();  for(int i=0;i<=m;i++)b[i]=read();  m+=n;for(n=1;n<=m;n<<=1)l++;  for(int i=0;i<n;i++)r[i]=(r[i>>1]>>1)|((i&1)<<(l-1));  fft(a,1);fft(b,1);  for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)a[i]=a[i]*b[i];  fft(a,-1);  for(int i=0;i<=m;i++)printf("%d ",(int)(a[i].real()/n+0.5)); }
